Body:
I need to perform some additional operation when new thing created in AWS IOT , to accomplish this requirement needed to trigger a Lambda function upon new thing creation event.

I followed AWS lambda capture IoT registry event
column9:
but not able to captured the event and also lambda was not triggered when I created a new thing.

Is it required to add any policies or role to capture the event? Or else any alternate way is there to capture the event?

"

Body: Hello , you may want to ask your question there: https://iot.stackexchange.com/
